ranil wika්ramasinha pa්rakashakala andamata hikkaduwe sita kalpitiya dakwa dhiwarayan sankhyawa asu dahasakata adhika bawath panadura sita migamuwa dakwa dhiwarayan sankhyawa panasdahakata adhika bawath pawasu aruna roshantha, me wyapruthiyen hani siduwena dhiwarayan sankhyawata aanduwa pa්rakasha karana aakarayata, wandiya nohoth, maha muhuda winasha karamin, apita nidahase rakiyawa karagana yamata methek thibunu nidahasa, apage kamaththenma nathi kara damimata, chinayen illa denna yana pagawa, wali ganna wasara thunata, panadura indala sita migamuwa dakwa dhiwara janathawata beduwahama, pawule hatharadenek innawanam, ekkenekuta dawasakata labena china pagawa ru.3.00 katath adu mudal.
